mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_reviews (user_id, book_id, title, content, helpful_count, not_helpful_count, reply_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{bookId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{helpfulCount}, #{notHelpfulCount}, #{replyCount}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, book_id, title, content, helpful_count, not_helpful_count, reply_count, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM book_reviews WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT id, user_id, book_id, title, content, helpful_count, not_helpful_count, reply_count, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM book_reviews WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND book_id = #{bookId} AND deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT id, user_id, book_id, title, content, helpful_count, not_helpful_count, reply_count, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM book_reviews WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
ORDER BY created_at DESC
ORDER BY created_at ASC
ORDER BY helpful_count DESC, created_at DESC
ORDER BY helpful_count DESC, created_at DESC
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
